text: Steven James Zahn (; born November 13, 1967) is an American actor and comedian. His movies include Reality Bites (1994), That Thing You Do! (1996), SubUrbia (1996), Out of Sight (1998), Happy, Texas (1999), Riding in Cars with Boys (2001), Shattered Glass (2003), Sahara (2005), Rescue Dawn (2007), the first three Diary of a Wimpy Kid movies, Dallas Buyers Club (2013), and War for the Planet of the Apes (2017).Braun, Liz (February 26, 2001). "Steve Zahn has a smart funny humour," Jam!. Retrieved September 15, 2017. He is the voice of Runt of the Litter in Chicken Little and its subsequent television series. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:People from Mankato, Minnesota Category:Actors from Minneapolis
title: Steve Zahn
